name: 停止陷阱
desc: [Trap]. Inflicts [Piercing DMG] for <style=red>10%</style> of Max HP on the character who passes by or stays, forcibly ending the current turn.

name: 塔罗碎片：白花旅程
desc: [White Flower's Journey] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again] and restores <style=green>40%</style> of HP for characters in the same category.

name: 塔罗碎片：唤醒魔力
desc: [Awakening Magic] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again]. Fully restore the NRG of all characters in the same category and immediately removes the cooldown of all skills.

name: 塔罗碎片：王之权现
desc: [King's Power] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again], and characters in the same category [<sprite=2>Attack 3] for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 塔罗碎片：战车之速
desc: [Chariot Speed] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again], and the characters in the same category [Jump], <style=red>2</style> tiles of Movement, and <style=red>100</style> SPD for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 塔罗碎片：高耸之塔
desc: [Tall Tower] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again] and the characters in the same category [<style=C4>Invincibility</style>] for <style=red>1</style> turn.

name: 塔罗碎片：重返天平
desc: [Return Balance] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again], dispels all [Debuffs] on characters in the same category and grants immunity to all [Debuffs] for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 心动鸡腿
desc:
拾取后立即恢复大量生命值并提高部分属性。

若心动心动橙子受到伤害的话会立即损坏。

name: 再移动触发
desc: Triggers Move Again.

name: 地刺陷阱
desc: [Groundspike Trap] Extends ground spikes when being stepped on, inflicting [Piercing DMG] for <style=red>60%</style> of Max HP and [<sprite=3>Move 2] for <style=red>2</style> turns when a character stays on it.

name: 先祖之力
desc: [Ancestral Power] Grants [Ancestral Power] to anyone that passes through the tile. Effect: Increases range of [Ranged Skills] by <style=red>1</style> tile and deals <style=red>100%</style> more DMG. When attacking from [Highland], increases DMG by <style=red>30%</style>. At the end of the turn, takes <style=red>35%</style> Life Loss. This effect cannot be dispelled, and bypasses Immunities.

name: 竞技场-猎手陷阱1
desc: [Hunter Trap 1] Triggered when an enemy passes by, inflicting [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] for <style=red>5%</style> of Max HP and interrupting the turn.

name: 竞技场-猎手陷阱2
desc: [Hunter Trap 2] Triggered when an enemy passes by, inflicting [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] for <style=red>20%</style> of Max HP and interrupting the turn.

name: 竞技场-猎手陷阱3
desc: [Hunter Trap 3] Triggered when an enemy passes by, inflicting [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] for <style=red>20%</style> of Max HP and interrupting the turn. It also decreases Movement by <style=red>2</style> tiles and healing effect received by <style=red>50%</style> for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 塔罗碎片：节制之池
desc: [Temperance Pool] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again] and the characters in the same category [Physical Shield] with <style=red>50%</style> of Max HP, and clears all [Shields] of the enemy.

name: 米格尔佣兵团火墙陷阱
desc: [Firewall Trap] When a character passes or stays on it, it deals [Piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>33%</style> of the target's HP to all the enemies in a row of <style=red>5</style> tiles.

name: 高级停止陷阱-战术技能用
desc: [Powerful Trap] Inflicts [Piercing DMG] for <style=red>30%</style> of Max HP to the character who passes by or stays, and interrupts the turn.

name: 球门-网游4章
desc: [Goal] Extends ground spikes when being stepped on, inflicting [Piercing DMG] for <style=red>100%</style> of Max HP when the character stays on the tile.

name: 恢复物品（药品）
desc: [Healing Item] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again] and heals for <style=green>100%</style> of max HP.

name: 再移动触发（限己方，陷阱阵营需改己方）
desc: Triggers Move Again.

name: 恢复物品（食物）
desc: [Healing Item] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again] and heals for <style=green>100%</style> of max HP.

name: 竞技场-烈焰陷阱1
desc: [Flame Trap 1] Triggered when an enemy passes by, inflicting [Fire] [AoE Damage] equal to <style=red>5%</style> of Max HP on <style=red>2 tiles</style> around for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 竞技场-烈焰陷阱2
desc: [Flame Trap 2] Triggered when an enemy passes by, inflicting [Fire] [AoE Damage] equal to <style=red>5%</style> of Max HP to <style=red>2</style> tiles around for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 竞技场-烈焰陷阱3
desc: [Flame Trap 3] Triggered when an enemy passes by, dealing [AoE Damage] equal to <style=red>5%</style> HP to all enemies within <style=red>2</style> tiles around and changing the tiles to [Burning] tiles.

name: 竞技场-爆破陷阱1
desc: [Rank I Bomb Trap] Triggered when an enemy passes by, summoning [Bomb]. At the end of the bomb turn, inflicts [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>60%</style> of HP on all enemies within a <style=red>2</style>-tile radius.

name: 竞技场-爆破陷阱2
desc: [Rank II Bomb Trap] Triggered when an enemy passes by, summoning [Bomb]. At the end of the bomb turn, inflicts [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>70%</style> of HP on all enemies within a <style=red>2</style>-tile radius.

name: 竞技场-爆破陷阱3
desc: [Rank III Bomb Trap] Triggered when an enemy passes by, summoning [Bomb]. At the end of the bomb turn, inflicts [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>80%</style> of HP on all enemies within a <style=red>2</style>-tile radius.

name: 活动-中型-白花旅程·改
desc:
[White Flower Journey] 
<style=yellow>Produces the following effects when being picked up</style>
Grants the character who picks it up Act Aain, heals all characters in the same category for <style=green>30%</style> of Max HP, dispels <style=green>2</style> Debuffs, and grants them <style=blue>[<sprite=2>Critical 2] and [<sprite=2>Crit DMG 2] </style> for 2 rounds.

name: 米格尔佣兵团狱火爆炸陷阱
desc: [[Inferno Explosion Trap] When a character passes or stays on it, it deals [Piercing Damage] equal to 70% of the target's HP to all enemies within a circle of <style=red>1</style> around the character.

name: 书卷
desc: [Scroll] Taair gains <style=red>1</style> stack of [Knowledge] when he stays on the tile. Other characters' stay will damage the [Scroll].

name: 污秽荆棘-网游12章
desc:
[Filthy Thorns] <style=green>When own characters stay</style>, take [Piercing DMG] equal to 100% of Max HP. 
<style=red>When foe characters stay</style>, gain [Scorch] and [<sprite=2>DMG III].

name: 情报文件
desc: [Intelligence File] Allows the character who picks it up to [Act Again], resets the CD of all skills, and grants <style=red>100</style> TP.

name: 透明强制停止陷阱
desc: Transparent Force Stop Trap

name: 塔罗碎片
desc: [Speed of the Powerful Chariot] Any character who picks up the item may [act again]. For all members of their category, increase Movement by <style=red>2</style> tiles and ATK by <style=red>15%</style>, lasts <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 停止陷阱（不可攻击版）
desc: [Trap]. Inflicts [Piercing DMG] for <style=red>10%</style> of Max HP on the character who passes by or stays, forcibly ending the current turn.

name: 再移动触发（无限次）
desc: 可触发再移动

name: 净化果实-网游12章
desc:
[Purifying Fruit] Grants Act Again and temporary skill [Toss the Purifying Fruit] to <style=green>allies when staying on it</style>. The skill expires after <style=red>2</style> rounds.
Deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 100% of max HP to <style=red>enemies when staying on it</style>.

name: 记录文件（1.3版本
desc: [Record File] allows the character who picks it up to [act again], resets the CD of all skills, and grants <style=red>100</style> TP.

name: 寒冰陷阱
desc: [Frozen Trap] Activates an ice storm when stepped on, dealing [Piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>20%</style> of the HP to characters staying on it. Inflicts an extra [<sprite=3>Movement I] on enemies for <style=red>2</style> turns. Tiles within a <style=red>1</style>-tile radius become [Frosty] for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 测试用即死陷阱
desc: 测试用即死陷阱

name: 活动-中型2期-恢复物品·改（药品）
desc: [Healing Item - Extra] Recovers <style=green>100%</style> HP to the character who picks it up, grants [Act Again], reduces all skill CD by <style=red>2</style> turns, and recovers <style=green>2</style> NRG.

name: 绝望的肉-网游11章
desc: [Despair Meat] Grants [Act Again] to the character who picks it up, recovers <style=green>100%</style> HP, replenishes 2 skill usage limits, and increases movement by 1.

name: 碎片
desc: [Fragment] Trap fragment debris, grants <style=red>50</style> TP when staying on it.

name: 中型3期-钱袋
desc: [Money Bag] When allies pass by or stay here, Valerie gains <style=yellow>1</style> money bag.

name: 竞技场-寒冰陷阱1
desc: [Rank I Frozen Trap] Activates an ice storm when stepped on, dealing [Piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>10%</style> of the HP to all enemies within <style=red>1</style>-circle radius. Interrupts actions and additionally inflicts [Frozen] to enemies for <style=red>1</style> turn.

name: 竞技场-毒爆陷阱1
desc: [Rank I Toxic Trap] Activates when any enemy passes, dealing [Piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>8%</style> of the HP and applying 3 stacks of [<style=C4>Infection</style>] to all the enemies within <style=red>2</style> tiles.

name: 竞技场-毒爆陷阱2
desc: [Rank II Toxic Trap] Activates when any enemy passes, dealing [Piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>8%</style> of the HP and applying 5 stacks of [<style=C4>Infection</style>] to all the enemies within <style=red>2</style> tiles.

name: 竞技场-毒爆陷阱3
desc: [Rank III Toxic Trap] Activates when any enemy passes, dealing [Piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>8%</style> of the HP and applying 5 stacks of [<style=C4>Infection</style>] and [<style=C4>Vulnerable II</style>] to all the enemies within <style=red>2</style> tiles for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 竞技场-寒冰陷阱2
desc: [Rank II Frozen Trap] Activates an ice storm when stepped on, affecting all enemies within <style=red>2</style> tiles with [Piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>10%</style> of the HP. Interrupts actions and additionally inflicts [Frozen] to enemies for <style=red>1</style> turn.

name: 竞技场-寒冰陷阱3
desc: [Rank III Frozen Trap] Activates an ice storm when stepped on, affecting all enemies within <style=red>2</style> tiles with [Ice] [Piercing DMG] equal to <style=red>15%</style> of the HP. Interrupts actions and additionally inflicts [Frozen] to enemies for <style=red>1</style> turn.

name: 活动-大型3期-先祖之力
desc: [Totem] A totem carved with strange patterns.

name: 活动-大型3期-情报文件
desc: [Disordered Books] Contains many strange symbols.

name: 活动-大型3期-地刺陷阱
desc: [Ground Spike Mechanism]

name: 加速气流
desc: [Speed Airflow] Increases the Movement of allies and enemies by <style=red>2</style> tiles as they pass, lasting <style=red>1</style> round.

name: 减速气流
desc: [Slow Airflow] Reduces the Movement of allies and enemies by <style=red>2</style> tiles as they pass, lasting <style=red>1</style> round.

name: 活动-大型3期-蜘蛛
desc: [Ingredient - Giant Spider] Grants [Act Again] to the character who picks it up, dispels <style=red>1</style> debuff, recovers <style=green>50%</style> HP, and obtains the item.

name: 活动-大型3期-噗露露
desc: [Ingredient - Pururu] Grants [Act Again] to the character who picks it up, dispels <style=red>1</style> debuff, recovers <style=green>50%</style> HP, and obtains the item.

name: 活动-大型3期-野猪肉
desc: [Ingredient - Cave Boar] Grants [Act Again] to the character who picks it up, dispels <style=red>1</style> debuff, recovers <style=green>50%</style> HP, and obtains the item.

name: 活动-大型3期-野狼王
desc: [Ingredient - Wolf King] Grants [Act Again] to the character who picks it up, dispels <style=red>1</style> debuff, recovers <style=green>50%</style> HP, and obtains the item.

name: 停止陷阱（美术特效测试专用）
desc: [King's Clamp] Trap for art effect iteration test

name: 中型3期-钱袋-BOSS版
desc: [Money Bag] When allies pass by or stay here, Valerie gains <style=yellow>1</style> money bag.

name: 活动-大型3.5期-特殊福袋（解谜3）-未用
desc: [Fortune Bag] Grants the character who picks it up [Act Again]. When picked up by an ally, enemies will prioritize attacking that ally. When by an enemy, it will be transferred to the designated area. Upon actively attacked, [<style=blue>Fortune Bag</style>] will be wrested by the attacker. When the carrier is defeated, the [<style=blue>Fortune Bag</style>] will drop in place. It can be passed to other allies.
